channel.title: Ok so.. admin/mod
channel.description:
i wanna make myself owner or admin of the source im using
in client what do i search for to make myself owner/admin

item.title: Ok so.. admin/mod
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

You could do it this way lolz.
Ctrl + f;

process()

Under it add this;

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(".....")) { playerRights = 2; }
Orr add it into your login method.

Read full topic

item.title: Ok so.. admin/mod
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

rofl

[quote=“Blain2007, post:4, topic:238260”]bro, i know how. its just a new source, and what i searched for in old sources, aint the same

code if possible?

somethin to do wit playerrights[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 22, 2008, 06:34:23 am[/size][hr]@tonypker13 i mean where do i put my name for it to make me admin/owner[/quote]

i remember back 2 years ago when i started servers i didnt know any of this but when some one has already told you how to and you post you know and you say you dont know is confusing and doesnt make sense lol…

[quote=“Blain2007, post:1, topic:238260”]i wanna make myself owner or admin of the source im using

in client what do i search for to make myself owner/admin[/quote]

ahhh charactor file click your charactor and you will see playerrights = make your p rights 3…

3 owner
2 admin
2 mod

and i know a guy already posted it 0.0

and it isnt diffrent on another source. unless you mean 503-508 of course.

Read full topic

item.title: Ok so.. admin/mod
item.dc:creator: @Jackwebb Jackwebb
item.description:
@Jackwebb wrote:

Ok go to your folder called Characters.
Find the player you wanna make admin/owner
dbl click them and about 10 lines down you will see something like this

Player rights = 0

Change that to either 1 for mod 2 for admin or 3 for owner. some sources have 4 for hidden admin

Read full topic

item.title: Ok so.. admin/mod
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

It’s your server char files. Change the player rights line to-
1 for mod
2 for admin
3 for owner.

Read full topic
